title: Big Ole Facts
lyrics:
Shun On Da Beat
Yeah
And when I tell you somethin', them actual facts though, you understand?
Them big old facts to be exact, you know what I'm sayin'?
When a nigga speak on this street shit and everything I do, man
How I live, man, them big old facts, man

Nothin' fabricated, you understand

When a nigga tell you that Yella had that sack, that's big old facts

Shun On Da Beat

And that's big old facts



Say you got a problem, these niggas don't want no smoke

That's big old facts

Nigga 'bout sixty thousand dollars every time I score

That's big old facts

Get-get to the money 'til a nigga can't get no more

That's big old facts

Didn't have dope, chop it up and sold some soap

That's big old facts

Nigga stayed ten toes down off in these streets

That's big old facts

Bought a long table so me and my niggas can eat

That's big old facts

I'm on my shit, that's why niggas hate on me

That's big old facts

Big Glock forty if a nigga try to play with me

That's big old facts



Hey, big old facts

Come through servin' in a big old 'Lac

Nothin' in my pants but a big old strap

Say I wasn't gettin' money, that's some big old cap

Serve you this bottle, gotta get on back

Traphouse boomin' with some big old sacks

Nine fifty for an ounce, that's some big old tax

Want some juice, one fifty for a big stack

Got my trap boomin' with some big old slap

You ain't livin' that life, that's some big old rap

Niggas snoozin' on me, took a big old nap

Watch me shit on these niggas, took a big old crap

All in my DM's, let me get on Snap

Baby bowlegged, stand with a big old gap

Nigga tryna think who I'ma shit on now

You ain't on my level, need to sit on down

Hey, all eyes on me

Whatever bitch you got, say I got about three

No gas on me baby, why? 'Cause I'm on E

If it's steam in the air, got the iron on me

Every other day, niggas lyin' on me

Nigga tellin', tryna come and drop a dime on me

Bitch, Elliot will come put the nine on me

I'ma beat that pussy like Rashawn with me



Say you got a problem, these niggas don't want no smoke

That's big old facts

Nigga 'bout sixty thousand dollars every time I score

That's big old facts

Get-get to the money 'til a nigga can't get no more

That's big old facts

Didn't have dope, chop it up and sold some soap

That's big old facts

Nigga stayed ten toes down off in these streets

That's big old facts

Bought a long table so me and my niggas can eat

That's big old facts

I'm on my shit, that's why niggas hate on me

That's big old facts

Big Glock forty if a nigga try to play with me

That's big old facts



Hey, I promise I'm, spittin' actual factual

Your nigga, he average, what he do impractical

I'ma kill that pussy just like a massacre

Lil' baby too skinny, her ass is not fat enough

Don't know that bitch, radical

Come let me savage you

Dive in that pussy, then I start to grab on you

When I start to beat it, that's when she grew ass on her

Come to my house, you better have that sack on you

Every day that I wake up

I'ma go grind and go get me some paper

You don't want no smoke so you niggas some vapors

Smoke me a nigga just like he a vapor

You niggas some haters, why is you haters?

You can't go buy it 'cause I got a tailor

I don't throw salt 'cause I am a player

Snake ass nigga but I am a gator

You a G-Shock and I am a Jacob

Baby, you an inmate and I am a bailiff

You ocean wet, baby, and I am a sailor

She love gettin' dicked down, and I am a slayer

Put in that work, 'til your neck hurt

Nigga playin', get put on that shirt

Check out my footwork, I got footwork

She say she like pain, well this that good hurt



Say you got a problem, these niggas don't want no smoke

That's big old facts

Nigga 'bout sixty thousand dollars every time I score

That's big old facts

Get-get to the money 'til a nigga can't get no more

That's big old facts

Didn't have dope, chop it up and sold some soap

That's big old facts

Nigga stayed ten toes down off in these streets

That's big old facts

Bought a long table so me and my niggas can eat

That's big old facts

I'm on my shit, that's why niggas hate on me

That's big old facts

Big Glock forty if a nigga try to play with me

That's big old facts



Shun On Da Beat
